alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Dorchester; Hampton; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 12 at 3:16PM EST until March 13 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM EST THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22 expected. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southeast South Carolina and southeast Georgia. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 9 PM EST this evening to 11 AM EDT Sunday. For the Wind Advisory, until 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
